data.name: Template
data.xml_template:
<route  id="{{source}}">
    <from uri="direct:{{source}}"/>
    <setBody>
        <simple trim="false">
<![CDATA[{{safe code}}]]>
        </simple>
    </setBody>
    <multicast>
        {{#each target}}
        <to uri="direct:{{this}}"/>
        {{/each}}
    </multicast>
</route>
